sources.title: The Chase (1946, USA) Peter Lorre, Robert Cummings - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: The Chase is a 1946 American film noir directed by Arthur Ripley , featu ring Peter Lorre and Robert Cummings. The screenplay by Philip Yordan is based on Cornell Woolrich's 1944 novel The Black Path of Fear. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Chase_(1946_film) Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
